channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China’s beleaguered real estate shares jump almost 10% after Beijing makes its ‘strongest housing pledge to date’
item.description: Investors gave China's stock markets their best week in years after Beijing promised more stimulus measures to support the economy.

item.title: Rightmove calls for ‘best and final’ offer after rejecting third Murdoch bid of £6.2 billion
item.description: After Rightmove's latest rejection, Rupert Murdoch's REA faces a U.K. takeover deadline later today.

item.description: Bump is ready to quickly move on from any issue that could be a problem for the political party he's trying to help win this election.

item.title: It’s Time to End Our Fed Obsession and Refocus on Growth
item.description: Long-term, broad-based economic growth is the goal, and the Fed alone cannot deliver it.

item.title: Early voting begins in Nebraska and Washington, DC
item.description: Nebraska and the nation's capital began early voting on Monday as the majority of the country has now started gearing up for the 2024 election.
